Articles.Content: I have made a custom part that is a solid fuel booster, I have added the thrustTransform and it produces thrust and all but on take off it is very unstable and shakes the whole rocket and breaks off. I have noticed that when ever testing it with a custom command module it just turns to the left every time. Any ideas on what it could be? thanks in advance.
Hmmm, turning to the left, pod might have an offset CoM. Not sure about shaking the whole rocket. Didn't have any experience regarding that. Wanna show your cfg?
